event Claim(address account, uint256 tokenId, uint256 amount)
event OwnershipTransferred(address indexed previousOwner, address indexed newOwner)
function claimMigratedCards(address account, uint256 id, uint256 amount, bytes32[] proof)
function hasClaimedMigratedCards(address account, uint256 id) view returns (bool)
function validateMigratedCardsClaim(address account, uint256 id, uint256 amount, bytes32[] proof) view returns (bool)
